com.ge.predix.mobile.network

Class URLRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ge.predix.mobile.network.URLRequest

  • public class URLRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    URLRequest PredixMobileJavaSDK

    Created by jeremyosterhoudt on 6/16/16. Copyright Â© 2016 GE. All rights reserved.

    This class models a URL request from any calling client code. Requests are usually in the form of JSON so this object contains methods that allow string data to be presented as JSON. It also provides convenience methods for setting and querying HTTP headers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      URLRequest(java.lang.String url)
      Construct a URLRequest from a String url The method defaults to HTTP GET and the headers and body text are defaulted to null and presented as empty.
      URLRequest(java.lang.String url, RequestMethod method)
      Construct a URLRequest from a String url, RequestMethod The headers and body text are defaulted to null and presented as empty.
      URLRequest(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String method)
      Construct a URLRequest from a String url, String request method The headers and body text are defaulted to null and presented as empty.
      URLRequest(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String method, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> headers)
      Construct a URLRequest from a String URL, RequestMethod, #headers and no body text.
      URLRequest(java.lang.String url, java.lang.String method, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> headers, java.lang.String body)
      Construct a URLRequest from a String URL, RequestMethod, #headers, and #body
      URLRequest(java.net.URL url)
      Construct a URLRequest from a URL The method defaults to HTTP GET and the headers and body text are defaulted to null and presented as empty.

                  RequestMethod method,

                  java.lang.String body)
        Construct a URLRequest from a URL, RequestMethod, #headers, and #body
        Parameters:
        url - A URL containing the client request.
        method - A RequestMethod representing the HTTP method (GET/POST/PUT/DELETE/OPTIONS/etc.)
        headers - A Map of HTTP headers
        body - A String body.

      • headerValue

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> headerValue(java.lang.String key)
        Used to query header values by key name.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getHeaders

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getHeaders()

        Returns:

      • bodyAsJsonObject

        public org.json.JSONObject bodyAsJsonObject()
        Retrieves the body as a JSONObject. The body should be well formatted JSON text otherwise an empty JSONObject will be returned.
        Returns:
        A JSONObject modeling the raw body text of the request.

      • bodyAsJsonArray

        public org.json.JSONArray bodyAsJsonArray()
        Retrieves the body as a JSONArray. The body should be well formatted JSON text otherwise an empty JSONArray will be returned.
        Returns:
        A JSONArray modeling the raw body text of the request.

      • rawBody

        public java.lang.String rawBody()

        Returns:
        A String containing the raw string representation of the body text.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        A URLRequest is equal to another when its internal url, headers, body, and method are all equal.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - A URLRequest to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if its internal url, headers, body, and method are all equal. False otherwise.
